name: design-loop
description: Local website design adjustment tool for designers

scripts.start: bun run build:ui && bun run bin/design-loop.ts
scripts.dev: bun run build:ui && (bun run dev:ui & bun run dev:test-app & bun run bin/design-loop.ts --url http://localhost:3456 --source fixtures/test-app)
scripts.build:ui: bun build src/ui/index.ts --outdir dist/ui --target browser --format esm --splitting && bun build src/ui/inject-script.ts --outfile dist/ui/inject-script.js --target browser --format iife
scripts.build: bun run build:server && bun run build:ui
scripts.dev:ui: bun build src/ui/index.ts --outdir dist/ui --target browser --format esm --watch
